cause.description:
THIS GROUP AND CAUSE IS TO PROTECT THE ENDANGERED PAINTED TURTLE AND PROVIDE A SANCTUARY FOR THE 1000+ TURTLES THAT ARE LIVING AT A LAKE THAT IS CLOSE TO THE TOBIANO DEVELOPMENT, WE WOULD LIKE TO BRING UP THE ISSUES AND POSSIBLY BE ABLE TO CREATE A SANCTUARY FOR THE TURTLES AND FOR PEOPLE OF ALL AGES TO COME AND SEE THE TURTLES...
Threats Alteration or destruction of wetlands and ponds with suitable nesting sites in close proximity. Traffic mortality on roads adjacent to wetlands. Human disturbance of basking or nesting turtles. Trampling of turtle nests by livestock and destruction by all-terrain vehicles. Illegal capture of turtles for pets. Release of unwanted, introduced turtles such as the Red-eared Slider which may compete with the Painted Turtle for food and introduce disease to native turtle populations.
1. DEVELOPMENT IS KILLING THE TURTLES
2. TURTLES ARE ENDANGERED
cause.mission: CREATE A SANCTUARY FOR THE ENDANGERED PAINTED TURTLE
cause.name: SAVE THE ENDANGERED TURTLES
